MCQ: What is the broadest sense of artificial intelligence (AI)?
Choices: a: Intelligence exhibited by humans | b: Intelligence exhibited by machines, particularly computer systems | c: Intelligence exhibited by animals | d: Intelligence exhibited by plants

MCQ: Who was the first person to conduct substantial research in machine intelligence?
Choices: a: Alan Turing | b: Albert Einstein | c: Isaac Newton | d: Stephen Hawking

MCQ: When was artificial intelligence founded as an academic discipline?
What led to the AI boom of the early 2020s?
Choices: a: Deep learning surpassing all previous AI techniques | b: Introduction of the internet | c: Discovery of electricity | d: Invention of the wheel

MCQ: What are the traditional goals of AI research?
Choices: a: Reasoning, knowledge representation, planning | b: Cooking, gardening, painting | c: Singing, dancing, acting | d: Driving, swimming, cycling
